ref: 5704 taralayati ʻ sets in tremulous motion ʼ Hcar., taralāyatē ʻ moves oneself to and fro ʼ Hcat., taralita -- ʻ dangling, tremulous ʼ ŚārṅgP. [taralá -- ]
Pk. taralēi ʻ moves restlessly ʼ, pp. taralia -- ;
Or. taraḷibā ʻ to become soft (of heart), be melted ʼ;
M. taraḷṇẽ, tarāḷṇẽ ʻ to wander wildly (of eyes) ʼ.
